channel.title: CVE Feed for 10up -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for 10up -- all products

item.title: CVE-2024-43116|2024-08-26T20:52:51.206Z -- 10up -- simple%20local%20avatars
item.description: Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in 10up Simple Local Avatars.This issue affects Simple Local Avatars: from n/a through 2.7.10.

item.title: CVE-2024-35684|2024-08-02T03:14:53.793Z -- 10up -- elasticpress
item.description: Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in 10up ElasticPress.This issue affects ElasticPress: from n/a through 5.1.1.

item.description: Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in 10up ElasticPress.This issue affects ElasticPress: from n/a through 5.1.1.

item.title: CVE-2023-48753|2024-06-04T17:27:31.323Z -- 10up -- restricted%20site%20access
item.description: Authentication Bypass by Spoofing vulnerability in 10up Restricted Site Access allows Accessing Functionality Not Properly Constrained by ACLs.This issue affects Restricted Site Access: from n/a through 7.4.1.
